channel.title: How do i add NPCS in a certain place
channel.description: how do i add NPCS in a certain place

item.title: How do i add NPCS in a certain place
item.dc:creator: @runaway runaway
item.description:
@runaway wrote:

OK you need to:
Check what id has the npc which one you want to add;
Get the exactly coordinates of place where you want it be;
OK lets get to work:

Open up the autospawn.cfg
Find the last line and copy it,then apste under it.Change the number after spawn = xxx with your npc id.The next number is x Coordinate,then the Y coordinate.Theres more options just look at the top of the list.
Hope this helps.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add NPCS in a certain place
